== Training Team Meetings ==

The Training Team meetings are scheduled on the first Wednesday of every month - unless someone has a better preference. Meetings are held at #ubuntu-training on irc.freenode.net. They are open for everyone interested and/or participating in the <nowiki>[[Training|Training Team]]</nowiki>.

=== Next meeting ===

* '''When''': 5 November 2008
* '''Start''': 20:00
* '''End''': 21:00
* '''Timezone''': <nowiki>[[http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?month=11&day=05&year=2008&hour=20&min=0&sec=0&p1=0|UTC]]</nowiki>
* '''Where''': #ubuntu-training on irc.freenode.net
* '''Chaired By''': Belinda Lopez (Dinda)

=== Agenda for this meeting ===

These items will be discussed at the next meeting:

 
* Working process & tool chains for updating the Ubuntu Desktop Course
  - Options for submitting updates; mailing list, irc, launchpad bugs
* Plans for UDS Jaunty
* Open Week session
